âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Peer-to-peer encrypted global filesystem â€¢ Fine-grained access control â€¢ Secure messenger â€¢ Encrypted email client and bridge â€¢ Private and secure social network
ðŸ“– Summary: Peergos is a decentralized platform focused on providing users with complete control over their data and online interactions. It achieves this through a peer-to-peer encrypted filesystem with fine-grained access control, a secure messenger, encrypted email, and a private social network. The platform aims to create a private web where users own their data and decide who can access it.
